definition: united front (abbr. for 統一戰線|统一战线[tong3 yi1 zhan4 xian4])
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)/abbr. for 統一戰線工作部|统一战线工作部[Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4]

sentences.english: To be responsible for the united front work for youth of the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 负责国家铁路青年统战工作和青年社团工作。

sentences.english: In this paper, the study about Liao Chengzhi overseas-united-front thought, is divided into three parts.
sentences.chinese: 本文对廖承志海外统战思想的研究，共分三个部分。

sentences.english: With the transfer of the whole Party work's main emphasis, the united front work has entered a new period.
sentences.chinese: 随着全党工作重心的转移，统战工作进入一个新时期。

sentences.english: The noble character' s charm is the basis to do the united front work.
sentences.chinese: 人格魅力是做好统战工作的基础。

sentences.english: Thereinto, "Harmonious but dissimilar" is a kind of united front idea with modem worth.
sentences.chinese: 和而不同，就是一种具有现代价值的统战方法。

sentences.english: The work of Non-party intellectuals is a fundamental work of a united front work in universities.
sentences.chinese: 党外知识分子工作是高校统战工作的一项基础性工作。

sentences.english: Grasping foundation outstanding focus well doing university united front work;
sentences.chinese: 狠抓基础，突出重点，扎实做好高校统战工作。

sentences.english: United-front work of a is the basis of our Party's united-front work.
sentences.chinese: 县级统战工作是我们党统一战线工作的基础。

definition: party affairs/work within the Communist party
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)/abbr. for 統一戰線工作部|统一战线工作部[Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4]

matters relating to the Chinese diaspora (as a concern of the Chinese government)
